Hi, I'm Beverley

I'm an accessibility lead and front-end developer. I currently volunteer with Three Rings CIC, and in the past, set up codebar Oxford and taught on Code First: Girls courses.

I'm very passionate about accessibility and inclusion. In a world that is increasingly digital, it's really important that everyone can participate. My current role is Accessibility Lead at the UK Ministry of Justice.

In my spare time, I like to sew, bird watch, and go out on the motorbike. My pronouns are they/them.
